pyslave Package¶

pyslave Package¶

Pyslave contains :

  • Instruments functions to load VISA instruments
  • Instrument drivers
  • Magic IPython functions to run python scripts in slave
  • Helper functions to write scripts for slave

conf Module¶

instruments Module¶

magic Module¶

script Module¶

Helping functions to write slave scripts.

pyslave.script.increment(filename, ndigits=3)¶

Return a filename with an auto incremented number at the end of the name. The number is zero padded to have n digits.

slave Module¶

Create the GUI to handle script execution. The module also defines the way scripts are converted before being run.

thread_terminated()¶
pyslave.slave.convert(filename)¶

Convert a python script so that it can be called by slave. The converted file is named by appending ‘_converted’ to the filename.
